overview: Scottish Balletâ€™s Prometheus & Epimetheus investigates the relationship between technology and our inability to see far enough into the future as we continue to advance.  Motion captured and digitally augmented, Prometheus & Epimetheus is a collaboration between the first ever Digital Artist in Residence Zachary Eastwood-Bloom and choreographer Alexander Whitley with music by Ash Koosha.
title: Prometheus and Epimetheus - Scottish Ballet
